column4: which software do I need to connect my laptop to a video projector?
I connected my laptop (runs ubuntu) with the projector but it wasn't automatically recognized
my laptop has buttons to switch to the projector, it works on windows 7
I pressed those buttons but it didn't work under ubuntu
that's why I am asking if a special software needs to be installed.
dont know about your laptop specifically, but try going into system>preferences>monitor
